title: Bug 101187: Localization key cannot be blank when adding
description: When attempting to add a localization key, if the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When the localization key is left blank in the properties file, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
EB: In the properties file, if the localization key is left blank, but has a valid value, the externalized text should still be displayed in the chart title.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Set a localization key and externalize the text in the chart title.
2. Ensure the localization key has a valid value, but is left blank in the properties file.
3. Observe that the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
